patterns.theme_definition: Uses @theme {} block for custom CSS properties (v4 feature)
patterns.utility_usage: Extensive use of @apply directive throughout custom classes
patterns.color_opacity: Uses slash notation for opacity (e.g., bg-gray-900/50)
patterns.dark_mode: Uses dark: variant prefix for dark mode styles
patterns.arbitrary_values: May use arbitrary values with brackets [value]

existing_implementations.description: Project already migrated to Tailwind v4 structure but needs validation
existing_implementations.theme_system: Custom theme variables defined in @theme block

potential_issues: Border color defaults may have changed in v4

tailwind_v4_breaking_changes.css_variables: Syntax changed from bg-[--var] to bg-(--var)
tailwind_v4_breaking_changes.border_defaults: border-* and divide-* default color behavior changed
tailwind_v4_breaking_changes.gradient_values: Gradient values now preserved, may need via-none
tailwind_v4_breaking_changes.preflight_changes: Placeholder uses currentColor at 50% opacity, buttons use cursor: default
